item.title: ORA-01704: string literal too long
item.description: Having an Oracle database with a given table storing long strings as binary data types (BLOB/CLOB), one might need to perform manual updates on those columns: update myTable set lobColumn='Some String Value' where somekey=somecriteria; The following error might occur while performing the direct update on that column: ORA-01704: string literal too long Cause: The string literal is longer than 4000 characters. Action: Use a string literal of at most 4000 characters.
